input.sentences: during a visit to my hometown i decided to stroll down memory lane .
my old school looks oddly smaller than i remember .
so many memories in the school yard where i made lifelong friends .
it was sad to see the basketball net in disrepair .
the front door was open so i took this shot before leaving .
output.sentences: We took a ride the other day to our old elementary school
As we drove up,we could see the older wing from the distance
The hopscotch was still there on the playground
The basketball hoop and net could have makeover
We peeked in one of windows and noticed that the furnishings hadn't changed very much.
